data.title: Fairfield Inn and Suites Edmonton North
data.meta_description: Relax at Fairfield Inn and Suites Edmonton North, a Griesbach hotel in Edmonton, Alberta, featuring complimentary Wi-Fi, breakfast and stylish suites.
data.text:
Welcome to Fairfield Inn & Suites Edmonton North

Kick back in comfort at our North Edmonton, Alberta, hotel

Reside in relaxation at Fairfield Inn and Suites Edmonton North. Our modern hotel provides a prime location just a short distance from West Edmonton Mall, the Ice District and CFB Edmonton. Rest in our stylish rooms and suites. Feel at ease with our complimentary Wi-Fi, plush bedding and flat-screen TVs. Start your day in Alberta, at our free breakfast buffet, serving an array of healthy and hearty options. Visit The Corner Market for on-the-go snacks and beverages. Maintain an active lifestyle while in Edmonton, Alberta at our 24 hour fitness center. Enjoy a refreshing swim with the family at our indoor pool, complete with a thrilling waterslide. Need to host an event. Have your business meeting or social gathering at our intimate event space. Showcase slideshows and videos with our rentable AV equipment. At Fairfield Inn and Suites Edmonton North, youâ€™re our 1 priority. Ask us about The Fairfield 100 percent Guarantee where we promise you will be satisfied or we will make it right. That is our commitment to you.
